page.title: 06MORE OF A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: We were sitting down, it was fish fingers, chips and peas. I was only allowed to go out at dinner plays. It was a sunny day, we were playing "Block", Michael was it. Me, Stephen, Stuart and Daniel, we all hid in the bushes. We went in we did some silent reading, then we did some topic, we have to write about The Domesday Book 1986. Soon it was time to go out, Mrs.Stothard said we could play football. I bought some football stickers off Richard Sutton for 30p. It was nearly time to go home. When the taxi had taken us home, I got changed and went to my Grandad's farm, I fed my little bullocks, I fed the big ones as well. I said "I'm going to get my tea, I'll come back later." I had beef mash and carrots.
